content.question: Which of the following best explains a similarity between the characteristics of immigration described in the poem and earlier immigration to the United States?

choices.label: Immigrants were often enslaved as laborers in northern factories and mills.
Immigrants typically acquired their own plots of land and became subsistence farmers.
Immigrants frequently relied on settlement houses to help them adjust to their new surroundings.
Immigrants compromised between the cultures they brought and the cultures they found in the United States.

content.answer: Immigrants compromised between the cultures they brought and the cultures they found in the United States.

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
